name: Boosting Ecommerce ROI with Accurate Facebook Conversion API Tracking
description: Implemented a high-quality Facebook Conversion API setup for a clothing brand’s ecommerce store, combining browser-side and server-side tracking to maximize data accuracy, reduce wasted ad spend, and help Facebook optimize campaigns for lower costs and higher returns.

sections.title: Server-Side Tracking with GTM Server + Stape.io
bullets: Used Stape.io as a dedicated tagging server for fast, privacy-compliant, and reliable tracking.
Set up parallel tracking (browser + server) to ensure Facebook always receives events even when browser cookies are blocked.
Optimized tagging flow to reduce data loss, leading to more reliable event tracking and better ad targeting.
Configured 4+ essential standard Facebook events (Purchase, Initiate Checkout, Add to Cart, View Content) with enhanced parameters for stronger remarketing signals.

sections.title: Maximizing Event Match Quality for Lower Costs
bullets: Achieved 8+/10 Event Match Quality, rated excellent by Facebook, helping the algorithm make smarter bidding decisions.
Implemented deduplication between server and browser events, avoiding double-counting and wasted budget.
Sent 10+ key ecommerce event parameters (email, phone, zip, currency, product IDs) with proper hashing for privacy and data accuracy.
Sent 10+ key ecommerce event parameters (email, phone, zip, currency, product IDs) with proper hashing for privacy and data accuracy.

name: Facebook Conversion API Setup
description: Implemented Facebook Conversion API (CAPI) with both browser-side and server-side tracking on WordPress and Shopify. Ensured event deduplication, improved attribution accuracy, and optimized data flow for better ad performance.

sections.title: Server-Side Tracking with GTM Server + Meta Pixel
bullets: Built a GTM Server container hosted via Google Cloud for robust reliability
Configured Meta Pixel events with deduplication logic using `event_id` for browser + server sync
Created custom triggers to fire purchase, view content, and add-to-cart across both WordPress and Shopify
Verified event delivery using Meta Events Manager — saw immediate jump in matching precision

sections.title: Browser-Server Signal Blending for Accurate Attribution
bullets: Integrated browser-side GTM tags with Shopify checkout and WooCommerce forms
Used fallback logic to fire server-only events when browser fails due to ad blockers
Blended client & server events to feed Meta with complete visibility on user actions
Enabled advanced remarketing by preserving tracking across redirects and slow-loading pages
